New Records: Hungary tied Bosnia and Herzegovina 0-0 in the UEFA Nations League match on September 10, 2024.
Key Match Events: Dominik Szoboszlai's free kick hit the crossbar, and Martin Ádám's header was denied by Bosnia's goalkeeper.
Pre-Game Insights: Hungary aimed to make amends after a 5-0 loss to Germany and had a new starting lineup with Dénes Dibusz in goal and several debutants.
Post-Match Reflections: Captain Dominik Szoboszlai criticized Bosnia's goalkeeping, and fans expressed disappointment despite Hungary's efforts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was Hungary's first in the new Nations League season and followed their Euro 2024 success.
